definition[0]: if something is on your mind, you keep thinking or worrying about it
example[0]: He looked as though he had something on his mind.
example[1]: Sorry I forgot. I’ve got a lot on my mind (=a lot of problems to worry about) at the moment.
definition[1]: if something is on your mind, that is what you are thinking about
example[2]: She’s the type of person who just says what’s on her mind.
